alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 1:35AM CDT until August 08 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 135 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrier, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Waukomis, Covington, Marshall, Kremlin, Breckenridge, Fairmont, Hillsdale, Carrier, Douglas, Vance Air Force Base, Bison, and North Enid. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
